posts.title: Shot Glass Roulette
posts.content: Lady luck won’t make you rich but with the shot glass roulette you can count on her to get you violently drunk. With sixteen full shot glasses at your disposal, it won’t matter whether what number or color you spin, the result is always the same – inebriation!

posts.title: Whiskey Tasting Glass With Chilling Base
posts.content: This whiskey tasting glass with chilling base will revolutionize the way you drink your favorite spirits. It features a metal cooling base that keeps the drink chilled for up to 30 minutes while the glass helps reveal the most sublime notes from a wide range of liqueurs.

posts.title: Bamboo Keyboard With Mouse
posts.content: This USB Keyboard + Mouse combo is made from natural bamboo and is compatible with all computers. The bamboo keyboard and mouse will give you a warm and elegant feel whenever you use your PC, even though you’re probably wasting away on dumb sites like this one.

posts.title: Old Fashioned Bucket Ice Cream Maker
posts.content: Churn out delicious frozen treats guaranteed to delight by using this old fashioned bucket ice cream maker. It comes with a heavy duty four quart aluminum canister and features a powerful 90-rpm motor that produces a smooth soft serve in less than 40 minutes!

posts.title: Edible Candy Cane Spoons
posts.content: Get into the Christmas spirit with these edible candy cane spoons. Included in this eating utensil set are six peppermint candy cane spoons that will add a tasty and holiday packed flavor when you use it to stir your hot chocolate drink.

posts.title: This Book Is A Planetarium Pop-Up Book
posts.content: Use your down time to get to know the various constellations in the sky with help from This Book Is A Planetarium. This educational pop-up book comes with everything from a perpetual calendar and message decoder to a planetarium that projects the constellations.

posts.title: Garden Root Slayer Shovel
posts.content: Dig through sod and roots like a hot knife through butter by going in with the garden root slayer shovel. It features a comfortable ergonomic o-grip handle to prevent slipping along with a sharpened v-blade tip with rip saw teeth – eliminating the need for hatchets and saws.

posts.title: Gutter Filter
posts.content: Keep your gutters from getting clogged up with leafs and other messy debris with this clever gutter filter wedge. Available as a two pack, these gutter filters will work in most standard sized home gutters, and are a great gift for a house warming party.

posts.title: Essex Foosball Table
posts.content: The Essex foosball table will make your humble abode a funner place for all without making it look like a college dorm. This official competition sized table is complemented by ergonomic wooden handles and steel player rods that spin and slide with ease.

posts.title: Skull Beer Bong
posts.content: There’s no better way to pound some spooky Halloween beers than with the skull beer bong. Once the desired brew is poured into the top of the skull, it travels down the spinal cord and into your parched mouth to deliver frightening levels of inebriation.

posts.title: Glow In The Dark Lipstick
posts.content: Pucker up and impress everyone at the club with this eye-catching glow in the dark lipstick. This unique shade is specially formulated to react under UV lights so that it transforms from a bright fuchsia into a hot neon pink when you’re out partying.

posts.title: Pizza Scissors Spatula
posts.content: Serve up your delicious melty pie without spilling toppings all over by cutting the slices using this pizza scissors spatula. Once you begin cutting, the slice automatically falls onto the plastic ledge so your slice stays intact until you’re ready to devour it.
